title: AI Real Estate Specialist
subtitle: Your 24/7 property expert for the Malta market
description: Capture every lead, answer every inquiry, and nurture every prospect around the clock. Our AI real estate specialist is trained on Malta's property market to qualify buyers and book viewings automatically.
